name: UuCA - Interactive Narrative Sample
description:
For the best experience please use full screen!

This is an interactive narrative sample I made with Twine for a Narrative Design Assignment I did last year, we were tasked to make a section of our game's narrative playable in an engine. The game has roughly 1400 words overall excluding alt text for images.

I based my game's narrative on what if the United States was made up of various corporations instead of the States we already know. You play as a woman called Sharon Silver, who is part of the Boss Alliance, who's home has just been threatened by the Max Empire now she has to fight to get back what's most important to her!
